snippet.title: Cookie Cutter - Official Combat Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2023
snippet.description:
Check out the new combat trailer for Cookie Cutter, a 2D Metroidvania from developer Subcult Joint. This punk rock trailer focuses on the game's combat, which features robotic transformations, chainsaws, guitars, motorcycles, and a whole lot of action-packed gore. Though there's no exact release date just yet, players can expect to fill the robotic shoes of Cookie Cutter later this summer on PC.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
